source.query:
(select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
)
union 
 (select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
)
order by date;

preCopyScript.value:
delete
    from  cd_ods.tb_asos_weather_day
   where tm between '@{pipeline().parameters.StartYM}'
               and '@{pipeline().parameters.EndYM}'

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2
UNION ALL
SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '2' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 5

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_data
WHERE PER_TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

DELETE FROM cd_ods.tb_nielsen_per
WHERE TAG BETWEEN '@{variables('minWeek')}' AND '@{variables('maxWeek')}'

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt
(
     tag 
	,short 
	,long 
	,display_order
	,parent_tag 
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name
	,hier_level_num 
	,hier_level_name 
	,if_date
    ,ifyyyymm 
)
select   tag 
		,short 
		,long 
		,display_order
		,parent_tag 
		,hier_num 
		,hier_name
		,hier_level_num 
		,hier_level_name 
		,if_date
	    ,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' if_yyyymm 
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt_temp;


delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod a
where exists ( select 1 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 where tag = a.tag);

insert into  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod
(
    tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,ifyyyymm
)
select  tag  
   ,short
    ,long
	,display_order 
	,parent_tag
	,hier_num 
	,hier_name 
	,hier_level_num
	,hier_level_name 
	,kimchi_jongajip_h1 
	,'@{variables('yyyymm')}' ifyyyymm
 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

 select 1 su

delete from  cd_ods.tb_nielsen_mkt a

     tag

	,parent_tag

	,hier_level_num

	,hier_num

 from cd_ods.tb_nielsen_prod_temp2 ;

 select 1 su

select srd_id
    ,sd_reviewid
    ,site
    ,site_id
    ,srd_title
    ,srd_content
    ,srd_writer
    ,srd_writetime
    ,srd_rate
    ,srd_crawl_time
      from  cd_ods.tb_rsn_market_full 
     where rnum between 1 + ( 1000000 * ( @{item().page} -1 ) )  and 1000000 * @{item().page}
